description: The two boys, who are both 13, remain in custody after they were arrested by police.
title: Two boys held after reports of intruders at Tiverton High School
title_page: Two boys held after reports of intruders at Tiverton High School - BBC News
maintext:
Two 13-year-old boys were arrested after reports of intruders at a high school in Devon.
Devon and Cornwall Police were called to Tiverton High School at 13:45 GMT on Thursday after they received reports of two young people who were not pupils on school grounds.
Police said two boys were arrested on suspicion of public nuisance offences at the school site.
Officers added the two were further arrested for suspected theft and assault but said this was not in relation to the incident at the school.
